title: Murder in the Coven: Maya's Magical Adventures continue
description: When the High Priestess is murdered in front of the whole coven, there's only one suspect... Maya's good friend is caught red-wanded. But can things really be that simple? In a race against time, can Maya uncover the secret past of the coven and prove her friend's innocence or will she have to face up to the seemingly inevitable conclusion that she's guilty as sin? A light-hearted magical murder mystery with a difference, no in fact it's very different. The fifth book in the 2017 Purple Dragonfly award winning series for young adult fiction, is another fast moving page turner. failure to read this book may result in delusions of normality!
author: Malcolm McCoard
